sys_ux_client_script.name: dropdown_1/configAria

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_356a7dca972971503c39f757f053af76
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Knowledge View">a16a7dca972971503c39f757f053af74</macroponent><name>dropdown_1/configAria</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api
}) {
    let choices = [{
        "id": "1",
        "label": "The article is incomplete"
    }, {
        "id": "2",
        "label": "The article contains incorrect information"
    }, {
        "id": "3",
        "label": "The article is unclear"
    }, {
        "id": "4",
        "label": "Other"
    }];
    
    let selectedChoiceId = api.state.selectedReason[0];
    let selectedChoice = choices.find(choice => choice.id == selectedChoiceId);
    let value = "Reason " + selectedChoice.label + ", Select to choose other available reasons for the feedback";

    return {
        "aria-label": value
    };
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-29 11:53:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>356a7dca972971503c39f757f053af76</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dropdown_1/configAria</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Magdas House" source="x_1027698_magdas_0">a70c2255972d7d103c39f757f053afe8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Magdas House">a70c2255972d7d103c39f757f053afe8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_356a7dca972971503c39f757f053af76</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-29 11:53:20</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
